manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Cashmere Mist has timeless appeal because there is something eternal about feeling beautiful, sensual and comfortable.

An Effective Deodorant and Antiperspirant with the Beloved Cashmere Mist Scent Combines the essences of Moroccan jasmine, lily of the valley and the freshness of bergamot against a warm background of sandalwood, amber and musk, it’s a sensually soft scent that seduces the senses.

Keeps You Feeling Dry and Smelling Fresh All Day An award-wining fan favorite, this effective deodorant and antiperspirant is infused with the beloved Cashmere Mist scent. The advanced formula controls wetness and perspiration while keeping you feeling dry and smelling fresh all day long. It’s so gentle that it can be used immediately after shaving without causing irritation, making it perfect for those with sensitive skin.

Previous page Moroccan Jasmine Powerfully fragrant, the sweet floral note soothes in its intensity. Lily of the Valley A sweet and clean green floral note imparting a bright freshness. Sandalwood Enhances the fragrance's floral bouquet with a sweet, woody quality. Next page Key Notes 1 Top Note 2 Middle Note 3 Base Note

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The ONE that works
reviews.reviewText: This deodorant is truly a game-changer! I first discovered it back in 2016, and ever since it is the only deodorant I have been using. Its luxurious scent is a perfect blend of warm and subtle notes, leaving you feeling fresh and sophisticated throughout the day. The formula is gentle on the skin, providing effective protection without irritation. The sleek packaging adds a touch of elegance to your daily routine. While it comes with a higher price tag, the quality and long-lasting fragrance make it well worth the investment. If you're looking for a deodorant that combines performance with a touch of luxury, this is an excellent choice.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It really is worth the hype!
reviews.reviewText: **UPDATE** - Jan 4, 2024I first purchased and started using this on Aug 11, 2023 and have used everyday. As of today, I still have enough on the stick for probably another month, but I just ordered another stick. So for five (5) months this wonderful product has been my staple and only deodorant. It still smells as lovely as day one and works effectively. No sweating smell at all.** This is your sign to INVEST in yourself and buy this little piece of heaven!Written Aug 11, 2023I first thought…”you’re nuts to pay $30 for deodorant”, but after I bought it and use it, I had no regrets. It feels so smooth gliding on your skin. The fragrance is so subtle and lingers all day. I don’t perspire at all. It’s actually better than some store bought deodorants I’ve read used in the past.Long Lasting: I started using it on Aug 11, 2023 everyday. Today is Nov 13th and there’s still half the stick remaining. I expect this stick to last another month. That’s incredible to get 4 months worth, which makes the price worth it.Splurge and buy it!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Great quality. This is the best deodorant I have ever used. I love the way it smells. It's long-lasting and effectively eliminates body odor. Unlike many other deodorants, it doesn't irritate my skin, though I did notice a slight itchiness after using it several days consecutively. However, this minor issue is easily resolved with a bit of moisturizer.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best Deodorant Ever!!
reviews.reviewText: I'm 18 and I usually sweat a lot in the summer and winter. My underarms have always become an issue in my early teens, but when I heard about this product on the Amazon website and YouTube, I had to try it out. After a few weeks of using it every single day, my odor and sweat went away. There's no stickiness and no strong fragrance to it. It helps me a lot whenever I work out at the gym or at work. It is a bit pricey but it's worth it, I give it 10/10!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Long lasting, lightly scented
reviews.reviewText: I really love this deodorant. I was looking for something different after using secret for so many years and it was not lasting and was becoming more expensive. This deodorant is pretty pricey but so worth it. The scent is not too strong, it lasts all day and I love it. I purchased it more than a month ago and I still have a lot left. I am going to monitor how long one stick lasts. I definitely recommend it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Just buy it!
reviews.reviewText: After reading astounding reviews about this deodorant, I decided it to give it a try! It smells powdery and fresh and does last. I work 12 hour shifts and can confidently state this deodorant held up my entire day. Definitely recommend and will purchase again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars I have loved for many years
reviews.reviewText: The scent is beautiful! Clean, fresh, feminine. I bought this regularly like ? 20 yrs ago? As my special fragrance. Then? When I moved last it got lost or? Not sure? Seems as if the other standards( degree, secret, etc). They just don’t smell good? Am I crazy? Yes there’s probably aluminum in all but until I find an alternative I’m using this lovely old friend and enjoying ❤️

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 29, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Smells like powder but not like gross Bo & powder that u get w the other brands def not worth the money though scent doesn’t last long & doesn’t really work the best for me, I have to reapply multiple times a day
This product is amazing. Great fragrance and lasts long.
Es caro pero sale barato quita todo el mal olor del sudor,queda un olor agradable aún sudando mucho

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on August 3, 2023

reviews.reviewText: Entrega en tiempo y excelente producto
